entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Preserving State and UI when App Returns from Background #22747
  • [Android] Numeric Editor's cursor is not visible when tapping it inside a ListView #22745
  • ListView duplicate first item #22742
  • PlatformBehavior.OnAttachedTo() is called twice during adding behaviour to a control #22740
  • Reinstate xml-docs build artifact for easier API docs publication #22736
  • MacCatalyst TAB key navigation only works if controls are inside of a ScrollView #22734
  • NamedFontSize ignores FontAutoScalingEnabled #22732
  • On Windows ListView doesn't visualise items when they have binded command with a parameter #22731
  • [Logging] Logs with "Microsoft.Maui.Controls.xxxx" as namespace tossing off Warnings anyway. #22730
  • Editor control: 1. OnMeasure event is not get called in iOS and 2. Unfocused event also not working if tapped outside of control. #22729

Closed

  • BoxView Opacity does not work in Android. #21558
  • [iOS] Crash because of FontIconSource #22682
    .NET 8 SR6
  • Click event fired even when button has views on top of it #22442
  • Click goes through solid elements on android #12014
    Backlog
  • Consider rounding numbers in `TransformationExtensions` #22513
    Backlog
  • Picker not opening when calling Focus() in .NET MAUI #22701
  • ImageButton border wrongly rendered (positioning and being clipped) #22738
  • iOS Notification Service Extension Deploy Fails #22586
  • Maui App using R8 & MauiHybridWebView crashes whenever it is killed in background by Android and then restarted by OS #22590
  • Connect To Mac - Object reference not set to an instance of an object #22722
  • After microsoft update Visual studio 17.10.1 Mac pair failed form last night 2024-05-30 #22733
  • Flyout shown for a moment when interacting with a backbutton in Android Shell #22649
  • [Android] Border doesnt expand on Content size changed #22606
    .NET 8 SR6
  • [Windows] Some icon fonts not working in unpacked apps #21993
    .NET 8 SR6
  • Resource not found in .NET 9 when xaml-comp is false #22536
    9.0-preview5
  • Add Translucent Status Bar Setter to Community Toolkit #22706

PullRequests

Created

  • [Windows] Fix ListView insert not working properly #22746
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-listview
  • SwipeView shows what's beneath while still swiping - fix #22741
    community ✨
  • Update the WebAuth code to support Mac Catalyst #22739
  • Correct path to gather API docs artifacts in CI #22737
    area-docs, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • [Android] Label.CharacterWrap wraps text too soon - fix #22728
    community ✨

Merged

  • [iOS] Crash because of FontIconSource - fix #22726
    community ✨
  • Make sure to redraw the background drawable when the size is updated #22626
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area-drawing
  • Update SkiaSharp #21648
    area-drawing
  • Fix the FontImageSource for Windows Unpackaged #22646
    platform/windows 🪟, area-fonts

Updated

  • [Android] ImageButton Border does not fit to CornerRadius -UiTest #21259
    community ✨, area-controls-border
  • Add Apple Privacy Manifest to new project template #21350
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-templates
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22537
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • [Windows] Fix performance issue using Shadows #18337
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area-drawing
  • Fixed line break mode for buttons #20133
    area-layout, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • [iOS] Button CharacterSpacing Fix #20537
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • [Android] Fix flyout behaviour switching exception #22453
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-flyout
  • [iOS] Fix Button image sizing and layout #22476
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area-controls-button
